name: Dirt Rally Driver HD Premium
description:
Dirt Rally Driver HD - This is a new arcade rally racing, in which you go to conquer the off roads in three different countries. Get ready to drive 19 cars and win in more than 100 races. You have to show all your skills to win and go all the way from novice to professional rally racer. On your way there will be many obstacles, your car is already ready, are you ready?

Game features:

✔ More than 100 races on different tracks, with different obstacles and weather conditions
✔ 19 racing cars that have different characteristics and capabilities
✔ A large open world;
✔ High quality graphics and particle effects
✔ Realistic physics with deformation
✔ Simple intuitive control
✔ Multyplayeer mode
✔ Even more features with the following updates
